CustomField.description: Sets the default active statuses on a project. Each value must be enclosed in single quotes with additional values separated by a comma. Projects with statuses defined in this setting will display on the Summary page; the assigned resources in these projects may also receive task start date notifications.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets the default active statuses on a project. Each value must be enclosed in single quotes with additional values separated by a comma. Projects with statuses defined in this setting will display on the Summary page; the assigned resources in these projects may also receive task start date notifications.
CustomField.label: Active Statuses
